title: EntityCollectionServiceBase
contents:
mode_edit code
API > @ngrx/data

EntityCollectionServiceBaselink

Base class for a concrete EntityCollectionService. Can be instantiated. Cannot be injected. Use EntityCollectionServiceFactory to create.

class EntityCollectionServiceBase<T, S$> implements EntityCollectionService { constructor(entityName: string, serviceElementsFactory: EntityCollectionServiceElementsFactory) dispatcher: EntityDispatcher<T> selectors: EntitySelectors<T> selectors$: S$ entityName: string store guard: EntityActionGuard<T> selectId: IdSelector<T> toUpdate: (entity: Partial<T>) => Update<T> collection$: Observable<EntityCollection<T>> | Store<EntityCollection<T>> count$: Observable<number> | Store<number> entities$: Observable<T[]> | Store<T[]> entityActions$: Observable<EntityAction> entityMap$: Observable<Dictionary<T>> | Store<Dictionary<T>> errors$: Observable<EntityAction> filter$: Observable<any> | Store<any> filteredEntities$: Observable<T[]> | Store<T[]> keys$: Observable<string[] | number[]> | Store<string[] | number[]> loaded$: Observable<boolean> | Store<boolean> loading$: Observable<boolean> | Store<boolean> changeState$: Observable<ChangeStateMap<T>> | Store<ChangeStateMap<T>> createEntityAction<P = any>(op: EntityOp, data?: P, options?: EntityActionOptions): EntityAction<P> createAndDispatch<P = any>(op: EntityOp, data?: P, options?: EntityActionOptions): EntityAction<P> dispatch(action: Action): Action add(entity: T, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T> cancel(correlationId: any, reason?: string, options?: EntityActionOptions): void delete(arg: string | number | T, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<number | string> getAll(options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T[]> getByKey(key: any, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T> getWithQuery(queryParams: string | QueryParams, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T[]> load(options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T[]> update(entity: Partial<T>, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T> upsert(entity: T, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T> addAllToCache(entities: T[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void addOneToCache(entity: T, options?: EntityActionOptions): void addManyToCache(entities: T[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void clearCache(): void removeOneFromCache(arg: string | number | T, options?: EntityActionOptions): void removeManyFromCache(args: (string | number)[] | T[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void updateOneInCache(entity: Partial<T>, options?: EntityActionOptions): void updateManyInCache(entities: Partial<T>[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void upsertOneInCache(entity: Partial<T>, options?: EntityActionOptions): void upsertManyInCache(entities: Partial<T>[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void setFilter(pattern: any): void setLoaded(isLoaded: boolean): void setLoading(isLoading: boolean): void }

Constructorlink

constructor(entityName: string, serviceElementsFactory: EntityCollectionServiceElementsFactory)

Parameters

entityName

Name of the entity type of this collection service
serviceElementsFactory

Creates the core elements of the EntityCollectionService for this entity type

Propertieslink

Property Description
dispatcher: EntityDispatcher<T> Read-only.

Dispatcher of EntityCommands (EntityActions)
selectors: EntitySelectors<T> Read-only.

All selectors of entity collection properties
selectors$: S$ Read-only.

All selectors$ (observables of entity collection properties)
entityName: string Read-only.

Name of the entity type of this collection service

Declared in constructor.
store Read-only.

The NgRx Store for the {EntityCache}
guard: EntityActionGuard<T>

Utility class with methods to validate EntityAction payloads.
selectId: IdSelector<T>

Returns the primary key (id) of this entity
toUpdate: (entity: Partial<T>) => Update<T>

Convert an entity (or partial entity) into the Update<T> object update... and upsert... methods take Update<T> args
collection$: Observable<EntityCollection<T>> | Store<EntityCollection<T>>

Observable of the collection as a whole
count$: Observable<number> | Store<number>

Observable of count of entities in the cached collection.
entities$: Observable<T[]> | Store<T[]>

Observable of all entities in the cached collection.
entityActions$: Observable<EntityAction>

Observable of actions related to this entity type.
entityMap$: Observable<Dictionary<T>> | Store<Dictionary<T>>

Observable of the map of entity keys to entities
errors$: Observable<EntityAction>

Observable of error actions related to this entity type.
filter$: Observable<any> | Store<any>

Observable of the filter pattern applied by the entity collection's filter function
filteredEntities$: Observable<T[]> | Store<T[]>

Observable of entities in the cached collection that pass the filter function
keys$: Observable<string[] | number[]> | Store<string[] | number[]>

Observable of the keys of the cached collection, in the collection's native sort order
loaded$: Observable<boolean> | Store<boolean>

Observable true when the collection has been loaded
loading$: Observable<boolean> | Store<boolean>

Observable true when a multi-entity query command is in progress.
changeState$: Observable<ChangeStateMap<T>> | Store<ChangeStateMap<T>>

Original entity values for entities with unsaved changes

createEntityAction() link

mode_edit code

Create an {EntityAction} for this entity type.

Parameters

op

{EntityOp} the entity operation
data

the action data

Optional. Default is undefined.
options

additional options

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

EntityAction<P>: the EntityAction

createAndDispatch() link

mode_edit code

Create an {EntityAction} for this entity type and dispatch it immediately to the store.
createAndDispatch<P = any>(op: EntityOp, data?: P, options?: EntityActionOptions): EntityAction<P>

Parameters

op

{EntityOp} the entity operation
data

the action data

Optional. Default is undefined.
options

additional options

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

EntityAction<P>: the dispatched EntityAction

dispatch() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch an action of any type to the ngrx store.
dispatch(action: Action): Action

Parameters

action

the Action

Returns

Action: the dispatched Action

add() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to save a new entity to remote storage.
add(entity: T, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T>

Parameters

entity

entity to add, which may omit its key if pessimistic and the server creates the key; must have a key if optimistic save.
options

options that influence save and merge behavior

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T>: Observable of the entity after server reports successful save or the save error.

cancel() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to cancel the persistence operation (query or save) with the given correlationId.
cancel(correlationId: any, reason?: string, options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

correlationId

The correlation id for the corresponding EntityAction
reason

explains why canceled and by whom.

Optional. Default is undefined.
options

options such as the tag and mergeStrategy

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

delete() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to delete entity from remote storage by key.

delete(entity: T, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<number | string>

Parameters

entity

Type: T.
options

options that influence save and merge behavior

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<number | string>: Observable of the deleted key after server reports successful save or the save error.

Dispatch action to delete entity from remote storage by key.

delete(key: string | number, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<number | string>

Parameters

key

The primary key of the entity to remove
options

options that influence save and merge behavior

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<number | string>: Observable of the deleted key after server reports successful save or the save error.

getAll() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to query remote storage for all entities and merge the queried entities into the cached collection.
getAll(options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T[]>

Parameters

options

options that influence merge behavior

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T[]>: Observable of the collection after server reports successful query or the query error.

getByKey() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to query remote storage for the entity with this primary key. If the server returns an entity, merge it into the cached collection.
getByKey(key: any, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T>

Parameters

key

The primary key of the entity to get.
options

options that influence merge behavior

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T>: Observable of the queried entity that is in the collection after server reports success or the query error.

getWithQuery() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to query remote storage for the entities that satisfy a query expressed with either a query parameter map or an HTTP URL query string, and merge the results into the cached collection.
getWithQuery(queryParams: string | QueryParams, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T[]>

Parameters

queryParams

the query in a form understood by the server
options

options that influence merge behavior

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T[]>: Observable of the queried entities after server reports successful query or the query error.

load() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to query remote storage for all entities and completely replace the cached collection with the queried entities.
load(options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T[]>

Parameters

options

options that influence load behavior

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T[]>: Observable of the collection after server reports successful query or the query error.

update() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to save the updated entity (or partial entity) in remote storage. The update entity may be partial (but must have its key) in which case it patches the existing entity.
update(entity: Partial<T>, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T>

Parameters

entity

update entity, which might be a partial of T but must at least have its key.
options

options that influence save and merge behavior

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T>: Observable of the updated entity after server reports successful save or the save error.

upsert() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to save a new or existing entity to remote storage. Call only if the server supports upsert.
upsert(entity: T, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T>

Parameters

entity

entity to add or upsert. It may omit its key if an add, and is pessimistic, and the server creates the key; must have a key if optimistic save.
options

options that influence save and merge behavior

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T>: Observable of the entity after server reports successful save or the save error.

addAllToCache() link

mode_edit code

Replace all entities in the cached collection. Does not save to remote storage.
addAllToCache(entities: T[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

entities

to add directly to cache.
options

options such as mergeStrategy

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

addOneToCache() link

mode_edit code

Add a new entity directly to the cache. Does not save to remote storage. Ignored if an entity with the same primary key is already in cache.
addOneToCache(entity: T, options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

entity

to add directly to cache.
options

options such as mergeStrategy

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

addManyToCache() link

mode_edit code

Add multiple new entities directly to the cache. Does not save to remote storage. Entities with primary keys already in cache are ignored.
addManyToCache(entities: T[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

entities

to add directly to cache.
options

options such as mergeStrategy

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

clearCache() link

mode_edit code

Clear the cached entity collection
clearCache(): void

Parameters

There are no parameters.

Returns

void

removeOneFromCache() link

mode_edit code

Remove an entity directly from the cache. Does not delete that entity from remote storage.

removeOneFromCache(entity: T, options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

entity

The entity to remove
options

options such as mergeStrategy

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

Remove an entity directly from the cache. Does not delete that entity from remote storage.

removeOneFromCache(key: string | number, options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

key

The primary key of the entity to remove
options

options such as mergeStrategy

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

removeManyFromCache() link

mode_edit code

Remove multiple entities directly from the cache. Does not delete these entities from remote storage.

removeManyFromCache(entities: T[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

entities

Type: T[].
options

options such as mergeStrategy

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

Remove multiple entities directly from the cache. Does not delete these entities from remote storage.

removeManyFromCache(keys: (string | number)[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

keys

The primary keys of the entities to remove
options

options such as mergeStrategy

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

updateOneInCache() link

mode_edit code

Update a cached entity directly. Does not update that entity in remote storage. Ignored if an entity with matching primary key is not in cache. The update entity may be partial (but must have its key) in which case it patches the existing entity.
updateOneInCache(entity: Partial<T>, options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

entity

to update directly in cache.
options

options such as mergeStrategy

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

updateManyInCache() link

mode_edit code

Update multiple cached entities directly. Does not update these entities in remote storage. Entities whose primary keys are not in cache are ignored. Update entities may be partial but must at least have their keys. such partial entities patch their cached counterparts.
updateManyInCache(entities: Partial<T>[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

entities

to update directly in cache.
options

options such as mergeStrategy

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

upsertOneInCache() link

mode_edit code

Insert or update a cached entity directly. Does not save to remote storage. Upsert entity might be a partial of T but must at least have its key. Pass the Update structure as the payload.
upsertOneInCache(entity: Partial<T>, options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

entity

to upsert directly in cache.
options

options such as mergeStrategy

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

upsertManyInCache() link

mode_edit code

Insert or update multiple cached entities directly. Does not save to remote storage. Upsert entities might be partial but must at least have their keys. Pass an array of the Update structure as the payload.
upsertManyInCache(entities: Partial<T>[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

entities

to upsert directly in cache.
options

options such as mergeStrategy

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void
